description.value: Concepts that represent an exception identifier code; that is, a code that is not defined in the value set (either model or site-extended). These are occationsally referred to a 'flavors of null' although this set of concepts is specific to the CWE datatype used in Version 2 messaging, and the codes may be used in the 'identifier' component of the 'triplets' in that datatype.
